https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9Vmmk7nEjPdb2sX9CsASKvAfh9M.jpg When a family visits Grandma's house on Christmas Eve, they leave their dog at home alone. And when burglars try to take the presents from under the tree, the dog must use every trick it knows to stop them. Alone for Christmas
